Rewritting some of the shared_utils functions to be used in R.

```{r}
author_name <- function(name) {
  
  m <- str_match(name, "([^\\(]*) \\((.*)\\)$")
  if (is.na(m[,1])) {
    
    orig <- name
    affil <- NA
    
    
  } else {
    
    orig <- m[,2]
    affil <- m[,3]
    
  }
  
  return(c(orig, affil))
  
}

normalized_author_name <- function(name) {
  
  recased <- str_to_title(name)
  
  recased <- str_replace(recased, "Jr\\.", "") %>% 
    str_replace("Sr\\.", "") %>% 
    str_replace("Dr\\.", "") %>% 
    str_replace("Prof\\.", "")
  
  names <- author_name(recased)[1]
  names <- str_split(names, " ")
  
  names <- names[[1]]
  
  if (length(names) == 1) {

    return(names)

  } else {

    last <- tail(names, n = 1)
    rest <- names[1:(length(names) - 1)]
    
    if (length(rest) == 1) {
      first <- rest
    } else {
      
      tot <- ""
      for (i in seq_along(rest)) {
        tot <- paste0(tot,' ', rest[i])
      }
    
      first <- tot
      
    }
    
    full <- paste0(last, ", ", first)
    return(full)

  }
  
}

```



```{r setup, echo=F, message=F, warning=F, cache=F}
library('tidyverse')
library('rjson')

inferred <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eitanf/sysconf/master/data/nonsys_inferred_gender_mapping.csv")
verified <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eitanf/sysconf/master/data/nonsys_verified_gender_mapping.csv")

inferred <- inferred %>% 
  select(-probability)

full_combined_genders <- rbind(inferred, verified)


```


```{r}
json_to_df <- function(conf_name) {
  
  full_gends <- full_combined_genders
  json_fpath <- paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/eitanf/sysconf/master/data/conf/", conf_name, ".json")
  
  json <- fromJSON(file = json_fpath)
  
  json_sub <- json[['papers']]
  
  df <- data.frame()
  
  for (i in seq_along(json_sub)) {
    
    id <- json_sub[[i]][1]
    authors <- as.data.frame(json_sub[[i]][3])
    
    authors <- authors %>% 
      mutate(paper_id = str_sub(id, -3L, -1L)) %>% 
      mutate(conf = json[[1]])
    
    if (length(json[['field']]) != 0) {
      
      authors <- authors %>% 
        mutate(field = json[['field']])
      
    } else {
      
      authors <- authors %>% 
        mutate(field = "")
      
    }
  
    df <- rbind(df, authors)
    
  }
  
  # normalizing author names
  
  names_vector <- df$authors
  
  names_normed_df <- data.frame()
  for (i in seq_along(names_vector)) {
  
    new <- as.data.frame(str_replace(normalized_author_name(names_vector[i]), "\\s+", " "))
    names_normed_df <- rbind(names_normed_df, new)
    

  }
  
  names(names_normed_df) <- "name"
  
  
  if (nrow(df) == nrow(names_normed_df)) {

    df_full <-
      cbind(df, names_normed_df) %>%
      select(-authors)

    df_full %>%
      left_join(full_gends, by = "name")

  } else {
    
    # this should never happen, but just in case we'll check for it
    stop("lengths don't match")

  }
  
}
```


